node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `faq` ( `faq_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `question` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `answer` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `keywords` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `hits` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`faq_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci
node.title: faq
